summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4340 for the improvement of Beach Drive from Murray Avenue to a connection with the existing trunk sewer in West Dawson Street produced west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51454, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
